column1: The Purple Pig////*Pig's Ear with Crispy Kale
column2: Pickled Cherry Peppers & Fried Egg - In LA
column3: The Church Key makes something sort of similar (Pig Ear Cheetos) but this is way better. The runny egg adds some creaminess to the fried deliciousness. The kale & pickled cherry peppers also help break up the swiney-ness.
